scripts.build:extentsion: next build && next export && mv out/_next out/next && sed -i '' -e 's/\/_next/\.\/next/g' out/**.html && mv out/index.html mv out/popup-test.html ../extension && rsync -va --delete-after out/next/ ../extension/next/ && rm -rf out && rsync -va --delete-after ./src/assets ../extension/
